name: Oboz Arete Low Light Trail Shoes - Men's
description: Ligthweight and sturdy trail shoes to explore Arches National Park, Head-Smashed-In Buffalo Jump, or your local trails. Weather-resistant woven mesh no-sew uppers protect your feet against light dew, and allow them to breathe on warmer hikes. The new A3 Chassis supports and stabilizes your foot to keep your secure and upright in variable terrain.Seamless synthetic mesh with abrasion-resistant TPU overlays for durability.O-Fit insole has multi-density EVA pods for comfort and cushion.Single-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support.A3 Chassis™ has TPU stabilizers for torsional rigidity and an ESS forefoot plate for support and underfoot protection.Tempest rubber outsole is lightweight, with multi-directional lugs for traction on loose surfaces.
